summary: Valve Corporation, based in Washington, is a popular video game company known for games like Half-Life, Counter-Strike, and Portal. Founded in 1996 by Gabe Newell and Mike Harrington, their first game, Half-Life, was a huge success. They later created Steam, a platform to buy and play games online. Valve has made many hit games and also started making virtual reality (VR) headsets. They have a unique way of working, letting employees choose their projects. The company is worth billions and makes most of its money from Steam, which is very popular for buying and playing PC games.
title: Valve Corporation
